      • addAppointment

        public static void addAppointment​(java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String description,
                                  java.lang.String location,
                                  java.lang.String type,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                  int customer,
                                  int user,
                                  int contact)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Uses an INSERT Sql statement to add appointment data to the database.
        Parameters:
        title - the appointment title
        description - the appointment description
        location - the appointment location
        type - the appointment type
        start - the appointment start time/date
        end - the appointment end time/date
        customer - the customer ID
        user - the user ID
        contact - the contact ID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

                                     java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                     int customer,
                                     int user,
                                     int contact)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Uses an UPDATE Sql statement to update an appointment in the database.
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - the appointment ID
        title - the appointment title
        description - the appointment description
        location - the appointment location
        type - the appointment type
        start - the appointment start time/date
        end - the appointment end time/date
        customer - the customer ID

        appointmentType the list of types present in the database for appointments

      • appointmentOverlapCheck

        public static boolean appointmentOverlapCheck​(int customerId,
                                              java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                              java.time.LocalDateTime end)
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Uses sql statement and a provided customer ID, start and end time to search for appointments that overlap with the appointment to be added.
        Parameters:
        customerId - the customer ID to check for overlapping appts
        start - the new appt start time
        end - the new appt end time
        Returns:
        boolean
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
